content.text: Hello there! What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher, and I'm pretty good at it! I always have my kids' backs, and I love capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I'm a programmer, but I'm not sure if I'll be programming this weekend. I usually enjoy my morning coffee, though!
What kind of programming do you do? I've always been interested in it, but I never took the time to learn it.
I do a lot of web development, but I've also done some mobile app development. It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging.
I'm sure it is! I'm impressed that you can do that. I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance. I grew up in an orphanage, as my parents died when I was young.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad you were able to find a good home in an orphanage. I'm bisexual, and I'm not sure if my parents would accept me if they knew.
I'm sure they would. I'm a great listener, and I always have my kids' backs. I'm sure I could help you talk to them about it.
Thanks, I appreciate that. I'm not sure if I'm ready to talk to them about it yet, but I'll keep it in mind.
Sure thing. Just know that I'm here for you if you need me.
